name: Gallery of Reincarnation
description:
The sole purpose of this game is to act as a museum or a gallery of time and space. In this litte gallery, six different scenaries are connected together with portal gateways.

This is definitely insipired by the valve Portal series and the toon flat styled 3d arts presented in games such as Monument Valley.
The experience players get from playing this game should simply be finding themselves enjoying the views.

Tools we used: Maya 2019, Zbrush ZR9, Unity 2019.1.5f, Photoshop CC

w,a,s,d for the first person controller, walk close to a portal then the entry will be automatically open for u. 
There is no winning or losing, take ur time in taking in each breathtaking environment that is available.
